articles.content: March 10, 2021 -- The Apple Womens Health Study released preliminary data on Tuesday that showed a wide range of menstrual symptoms reported by users, including the most common ones cramps, bloating,… [+2075 chars]

articles.author: Alex Alderson
articles.title: Xiaomi announces Mi Pilot testing program for MIUI 12.5 on 21 devices - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Xiaomi has started recruiting another batch of pilot testers for MIUI 12.5. The program is open for 21 recent smartphones, including the Mi 11, Mi 10, Mi 9, Mi 9 SE, the Redmi K20 Pro, Redmi Note 8 Pro and the Redmi Note 9T, among others.
articles.content: Xiaomi has announced another round of Mi Pilot testing for its MIUI Global Stable ROM. The term Global Stable is slightly misleading here, mind you, as the company has opened the Mi Pilot program to … [+1494 chars]

articles.author: Holden Walter-warner
articles.title: Apple Watch helps save New Hampshire teacher's life after he couldn't get out of a frozen river - Daily Mail
articles.description: William Rogers, 62, a local teacher, was ice skating when the river ice cracked underneath him, leaving him stuck. He used his Apple Watch to call 911, which helped rescue personnel respond quickly.
articles.content:
A local New Hampshire man is feeling thankful for his Apple Watch after it helped save his life after a harrowing ordeal over the weekend.
